sml:ProcessChain.gml:description: This process chain determines MODIS position vector and the ECEF view vector. This chain is composed of 2 chain, one specific to MODIS, the other is generic.
sml:ProcessChain.gml:name: MODIS

sml:ProcessChain.gml:description: This process chain determines the matrix to tansform the sample view vector into the instrument view vector in function of the band, and x and y pixels. This chain is MODIS SPECIFIC.
This process chain transform the satellite view vector into the ECEF view vector.

sml:ProcessModel.gml:description: Loads TLE data from a TLE data file and outputs the TLE corresponding to the requested time.
